scripts.build: echo "The build step is not required when using JavaScript!" && exit 0
scripts.compile:lambda-app: cd lambda_app && npm run clean && npm run compile:src && cd ../
scripts.build:lambda-app: mkdir -p build && cd lambda_app && npm run build && cp -r lambda-app-build ../build && cd ../
scripts.build:ui: mkdir -p build && cd ui && npm run build && cp -r build ../build/ui-build && cd ../
scripts.clean: rm -r cdk.out build || true && cd lambda_app && npm run clean && cd ../
